cause.description:
This group is dedicated to saving "the Daynay" by raising funds to help pay her self-inflicted high-maintenance impulse-bought spending-spree debts. Only from those that care about her can she be saved, and by making a small sacrifice we can once again restore order in her life.
Plus, she's good-looking.
1. Assume responsibility for the debt of Dayna
2. Save the Ferrets
cause.mission: To save Dayna from credit card hasslers, high interest rates, and the biggest enemy of all, herself.
cause.name: Save Dayna Marie Ferrone!
